mean_cn: n. 评论员，解说员，实况播音员，时事评论者
mean_en: a person who provides a description on a radio or television program of an event (such as a sports contest) as it is happening
word_etyma: com共同+ment表行为+ator做...工作的人 →评论者
sentence: The commentator really helps me understand the game.
sentence_trans: 解说员的确能帮助我理解这场比赛。
